deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The Mold indicator YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Mold indicator using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the imported configuration is correct and remove the Mold indicator YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
